Class MGate

  • java.lang.Object
    • qcv1.MGate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QGate
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MHGate, MPhaseGate, MSGate, MTGate, MXGate, MYGate, MZGate

    public abstract class MGate
extends java.lang.Object
implements QGate
    Matrix representation of a single qubit gate
    Author:
    Michael Chiang

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyGate(QRegister reg)
      Apply the gate to the register (i.e perform the matrix multiplication of the gate with the state vector of the register)

    • Method Detail

      • initGate

        public void initGate(java.lang.String type,
            int[] controls,
            int target,
            int numOfStates,
            Matrix offResult,
            Matrix onResult)
        Initialize the gate by creating the matrix that represents the linear operation associated with the gate
        Parameters:
        type - Type of matrix (e.g. complex (dense), sparse, sparse gate)
        controls - Array of the positions of the control qubits
        target - The position of the qubit that the gate is applied on
        numOfStates - Number of basis states in the register
        offResult - Result when gate is applied to state |0>
        onResult - Result when gate is applied to state |1>

      • applyGate

        public void applyGate(QRegister reg)
        Apply the gate to the register (i.e perform the matrix multiplication of the gate with the state vector of the register)
        Specified by:
        applyGate in interface QGate
        Parameters:
        reg - Register storing the qubits
